Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Garfield Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from 47th/Dan Ryan to 63rd/Dan Ryan, in both directions, and will conclude at 11:15 p.m.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State
#55 Garfield

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
